name: Moonanners
description:
Bananapocalypse happens. Bananas are eradicated from Earth due to a disease and bananas have disappeared for decades. 100 years ago, humankind sent a probe to the moon to give it an atmosphere. Now it has an atmosphere, but it is no place for bananas. This is why we are growing things on the moon to terraform the environment. We ate bananas as a kid, but they no longer exist. We need to rediscover this taste.

This game was made for the Summer Harvest Jam
